content.query:
select * from jpmia.TopCompaniesWithMoreJobs;

--State wise Job Report - generate a report at location level by aggregating the jobs at experience level
select locations,experience_level, count(job_id)
from jpmia.JobDetail
where locations != 'N/A'
group by locations, experience_level
order by locations,count(job_id) desc;

--Jobs which have high applicants
select top 10 title, applies 
from jpmia.JobDetail
order by applies DESC;

select * from jpmia.JobApplicationRate order by application_percentage desc;

--Domains in order of more job postings
select posting_domain,count(job_id)
from jpmia.JobDetail
where posting_domain is not null
GROUP by posting_domain
order by count(job_id) desc
